name: Gun Control (zilard)
description:
Press R to reset! Press SPACE to change camera focus!

This is my entry for the GMTK game jam 2020! The theme was "out of control", so I decided to make a puzzle game where you were out of control of your gun (or player while attempting to control your gun).  All done solo by me, zilard.

I made this over the course of the 2 day jam, all art done by me and all sounds I mixed from creative-commons sound effects.

Music used:

"Loopster" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
